    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACCRUAL
      Transaction represents an Accrual (For either interest, charge or a penalty
      APPROVE_TRANSFER 
      CHARGE_PAYMENT 
      CONTRA 
      DISBURSEMENT 
      INCOME_POSTING 
      INITIATE_TRANSFER
      A Loan Transfer involves two steps, first a "initiate" Loan transfer transaction done by the Source branch followed by a "complete" loan transaction initiated by the destination branch
      INVALID 
      MARKED_FOR_RESCHEDULING 
      RECOVERY_REPAYMENT
      This type of transactions is allowed on written-off loans where mfi still attempts to recover payments from applicant after writing-off.
      REFUND 
      REFUND_FOR_ACTIVE_LOAN 
      REJECT_TRANSFER 
      REPAYMENT 
      REPAYMENT_AT_DISBURSEMENT
